title: Medical Camp Management System
description: A full-featured React.js application designed to manage medical camps efficiently, including patient registration, scheduling, and medical record management.

title: Restaurant Reservation System
description: A comprehensive application built with React.js for managing restaurant reservations, tables, and customer interactions and order  efficiently.

title: Interactive Art Studio
description: An engaging React.js application that allows users to create and share their own digital paintings and drawings, featuring a variety of tools and brushes for artistic expression.

title: Smart Home Management
description: A modern React.js application designed to streamline the management of smart home devices, offering users control over lighting, security, and environment settings from a unified interface.
